sentences.en: Flexibility does not mean recklessness; Recklessness must be rejected.
sentences.cn: 灵活不是妄动, 妄动是应该拒绝的.

sentences.en: He felt a surge of recklessness.
sentences.cn: 他感觉到一阵不顾一切的冲动。

sentences.en: He has a smack of recklessness in his character.

sentences.cn: 他不久便后悔他的鲁莽.

sentences.en: His maverick nature is forever leading him into tricky situations but despite his recklessness, he has an inherent sense of responsibility and will try to make amends for the chaos he causes.
sentences.cn: 而“离经叛道”的个性总是让他陷入困境，虽有些鲁莽，但凭借与生俱来的责任感，他总是想方设法修复自己造成的混乱局面。

sentences.en: His recklessness brought down disaster on the whole family.
sentences.cn: 他草率行事,使整个家庭遭到了灾难.

sentences.en: How can businesses square the circle, encouraging risk taking but avoiding recklessness?
sentences.cn: 企业怎么能做不可能的事, 在鼓励冒险的同时又避免鲁莽 呢 ?

sentences.en: If her manner was still harsh, recklessness had tempered it.
sentences.cn: 她的态度,如果仍然未改尖酸刻薄, 那么轻率则使其不那么厉害了.

sentences.en: In his face there was a look of exaltation not unmixed with recklessness.
sentences.cn: 他脸上是一片狂欢大乐的样子,掺杂着不顾一切的神气.

sentences.en: Recklessness never had a place in the business world.
sentences.cn: 鲁莽的人难以在商业世界立足.

sentences.en: The headstrong recklessness of youth may be fine in some areas, but not behind the wheel of a car.
sentences.cn: 年轻人在一些方面任性鲁莽一点也许没什么大不了，但是在驾车时可不行。

sentences.en: The lads'energy pleased him but their recklessness worried him.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们的劲头使他高兴,他们的冒失又使他担心.

sentences.en: The loss stemmed from his recklessness.
sentences.cn: 损失是他的鲁莽冒失造成的.

sentences.en: There is a smack of recklessness in his character.
Unplanned action , recklessness, impetuosity and carelessness will only lead to defeat.
sentences.cn: 盲动 、 乱干 、 急躁或粗枝大叶,都必然招致失败.

sentences.en: Vernon's happy recklessness was dashed by fears for Miss Middleton.
sentences.cn: 维农毫无顾忌的愉快心情被弥得尔顿小姐的担心取代了.

words.tran_cn: 鲁莽的，不顾后果的；粗心大意的
鲁莽；轻率；不顾一切，不顾后果
